description: "This mid-18th century maritime map charts the seas between Peninsula Malaysia and Sumatra, including Singapore—named ‘Po. Panjang’—with the old and new Straits of Singapore marked. The numbers indicate sea depth (bathymetry)."
title: "A chart of the seas between the straits of Banca and P'o Timon : with the eastern part of the Straits of Malacca"
